resources.string: Your loved ones are the most important part of your life. That\'s why e-fam is making your shopping experience easier, leaving you with plenty of quality time for your family\.
Get every grocery item you could possibly want without leaving the comfort of your home. Your convenience is our priority at e-fam\.
Having a hectic work-day? Not to worry! e-fam delivers your shopping right to your office, hassle-free!
Beat the crazy lines at the supermarket. You can shop with e-fam right on your phone and they will be packed and ready for collection by the time you get to store!
